summary: Implements a multilingual text-to-image diffusion pipeline that transforms English or Chinese prompts into images using a VAE, bilingual CLIP encoder, mT5 text encoder, HunyuanDiT transformer denoiser, and diffusion scheduler, with optional safety checking and classifier-free guidance.
business_intent: Enable a commercial AI service for generating high-quality images from multilingual prompts, supporting both English and Chinese while ensuring content safety and controllable generation.
